subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Serhiy Honchar, a 36-year-old Ukrainian, won Stage 7 of the Tour de France by such a wide margin that he also took over the yellow jersey of the overall leader.  Bobby Julich of the United States crashed and is out of the race.
snippet: Serhiy Honchar, a 36-year-old Ukrainian, won Stage 7 of the Tour de France by such a wide margin that he also took over the yellow jersey of the overall leader.  Bobby Julich of the United States crashed and is out of the race.
